function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on AI-based prediction models for pandemic forecasting","Impact":"Potential inaccurate predictions leading to inadequate preparation for the pandemic peak","Mitigation":"Combine AI predictions with traditional epidemiological methods for more accurate forecasting","Technologies":"Integration of AI with traditional epidemiological models","People":"Public health authorities, policymakers, and researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities and research institutions"},{"Description":"Use of AI for patient management and monitoring","Impact":"Risk of misdiagnosis or inaccurate patient monitoring leading to incorrect treatment","Mitigation":"Verification of AI-generated recommendations by medical professionals, regular validation of AI algorithms using clinical data","Technologies":"Integration of AI with medical monitoring devices, incorporation of clinical data for AI validation","People":"Healthcare providers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and medical institutions"},{"Description":"AI-facilitated drug discovery for COVID-19 treatment","Impact":"Potential for ineffective drug discovery due to limitations of AI-based testing","Mitigation":"Combined use of AI with traditional drug discovery methods, rigorous validation and testing of AI-generated results","Technologies":"Integration of AI with drug discovery processes, validation using clinical trials and laboratory testing","People":"Pharmaceutical researchers, drug developers","Owner":"Pharmaceutical research institutions and drug development companies"}]}
